name: DOOM
overview: All Hell has run amok! Monstrous demons from another dimension use their gruesome talents to turn your space station into a blood-splattered slaughterhouse. They got black magic. You got firepower. Fireballs and lost souls face shotguns, chainsaws, and rocket launchers! Butcher the hordes of Hell. Or get butchered, if you don’t have the skill and pure guts to save your skin!
